subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Alexei Kovalev, the last player still active from the Rangers’ 1994 Stanley Cup championship team before his retirement last week, said Sunday that he intends to play in Europe next season.
snippet: Alexei Kovalev, the last player still active from the Rangers’ 1994 Stanley Cup championship team before his retirement last week, said Sunday that he intends to play in Europe next season.
